action.primary: Dispels Heat, relieves toxicity, promotes diuresis, reduces swelling and Clears Damp-Heat

indications: Tonsillitis, External and Internal trauma, infectious hepatitis, febrile convulsion, diarrhea, dysentery, appendicitis, infantile malnutrition, swellings, snake bites
Topically, as a lotion for dermatitis

notes: This herb can be pounded for juice, pounded for applying or decocted for washing.
